servinfosub.title: DTC Detecting Condition and Trouble Area

ptxt.emph: P0101: Mass or Volume Air Flow Circuit Range/Performance

entry.ptxt: This DTC is detected if any one of the following conditions is met.

item.ptxt: Measured MAF sensor signal is out of specified range for 5 sec.
Ratio between targeted MAF sensor signal and measured MAF sensor signal is out of specified range.

entry.ptxt: (2 D/C detection logic but MIL does not light up)

servinfosub.title: Wiring Diagram
servinfosub.ptxt: Refer to DTC P0100 / P0102 / P0103:N32A .

item.ptxt: If DTC other than aimed DTC are previously detected in DTC confirmation procedure, be sure to troubleshoot DTC previously detected.
Make sure that the following conditions are satisfied when using this procedure.

s1.ptxt: Run engine at idle speed for 3 min.

testgroup.question: Was “Engine and Emission Control System Check” performed?

action.ptxt: Go to Engine and Emission Control System Check:N32A .

testgroup.title: Engine oil level check

test1.ptxt: Check oil filler cap and oil level gauge for looseness.
If conditions of cap and gauge are OK, check engine oil level.

testgroup.question: Is engine oil level within specified level?

action.ptxt: Adjust engine oil to specified level.

testgroup.title: Air intake system and exhaust system check

test1.ptxt: Check air intake system, exhaust system, vacuum hose and PCV hose for clogging and damage.

testgroup.question: Are they in good condition?

test1.ptxt: Check throttle body for dirt and damage.

testgroup.title: MAF sensor and its circuit check

test1.ptxt: Check MAF sensor and its circuit according to Step 2 through 5 under DTC P0100 / P0102 / P0103:N32A .

testgroup.question: Are they in good condition?

testgroup.title: Troubleshooting of other DTC(s) at the same time
testgroup.question: Is other DTC(s) detected together?

action.ptxt: Go to troubleshooting for applicable DTC.
Substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.
